name: Fallout 76: S.P.E.C.I.A.L. Edition
summary: The edition, in addition to Fallout 76 game, consists of a set of three pin badges from the Fallout S.P.E.C.I.A.L attribute range, the ruleset that powers all Fallout games and an acronym standing for the primary statistics in the system: Strength, Perception, Endurance, Charisma, Intelligence, Agility and Luck. This edition features the Strength, Charisma & Luck attributes.
